attributes.action: Fukushima - world governments need to act together
attributes.additional_details:
The uk government should provide help to stop this world wide disaster and to encourage world leaders to do the same  . . To prevent the world being uninhabitable for future generations.

How can all the world governments just stand by and watch this escalate to the stage that the worlds oceans are going to be poisoned with radioactive elements .

Please save our planet earth .
